participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and adventurous, Ethan loves exploring new skateboarding tricks and bonding with his friends.
participant_1.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, Sophie enjoys fitness and spending time with her dogs.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.
